quotes.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Stand out from the crowd, be yourself
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: The only place where your dream becomes impossible is in your own thinking
quotes.name: Robert Schuller

quotes.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Some days you just have to create your own sunshine
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We don’t see things as they are, we see them as we are
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Now and then it's good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy
quotes.name: Guillaume Apollinaire

quotes.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony
quotes.name: Mohandas Gandhi

quotes.quote: Learning is a gift. Even when pain is your teacher
quotes.name: Maya Watson

quotes.quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The past has no power over the present moment
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Happiness is an attitude. We either make ourselves miserable, or happy and strong
quotes.name: Francesca Reigler

quotes.quote: The temptation to quit will be greatest just before you are about to succeed
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I would rather have a mind opened by wonder, than one closed by belief
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is no greatness where there is no simplicity, goodness and truth
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: No matter what the situation, remind yourself "I have a choice."
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: All you can change is yourself, but sometimes that changes everything!
quotes.name: Gary Goldstein

quotes.quote: If we’re growing, we’re always going to be out of our comfort zone
quotes.name: John Maxwell

quotes.quote: The difference between stumbling blocks and stepping stones is how you use them
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.quote: Life does not have to be perfect to be wonderful
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Whatever you want to do, do it now. There are only so many tomorrows
quotes.name: Michael Landon

quotes.quote: The difference between winning and losing is most often… not quitting
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: All things are difficult before they are easy
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Happiness, like unhappiness, is a proactive choice
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: If you can change your mind, you can change your life
quotes.name: William James

quotes.quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves
quotes.name: Viktor Frankl

quotes.quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn’t know you left open
quotes.name: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: The best way to gain self-confidence is to do what you are afraid to do
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.quote: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: You cannot have a positive life with a negative mind
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: In order to carry a positive action, we must develop a positive vision
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments
quotes.name: Rose Kennedy

quotes.quote: There are three constants in life - change, choice, and principles
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Character develops itself in the stream of life
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you can change the world
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap, but by the seeds that you plant
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door
quotes.name: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Happiness resides not in the possessions, not in the gold, happiness dwells in the soul
quotes.name: Democritus

quotes.quote: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: What we need is more people who specialize in the impossible
quotes.name: Theodore Roethke

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm moves the world
quotes.name: Arthur Balfour

quotes.quote: It is always the simple that produces the marvelous
quotes.name: Amelia Barr

quotes.quote: Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge
quotes.name: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it
quotes.name: Walt Disney
